description: Analysis of relationships between different annotation keys across dataflows

options.content: Annotation Analysis of ${source_annotation} Grouped by ${annotation_key}

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    time_bucket_gapfill(($__interval_ms || ' ms')::interval, i.timestamp) AS time,
    COALESCE(sa.value, 'Not Present') || ' (' || COALESCE(a.value, 'Not Present') || ')' AS series_name,
    COALESCE(SUM(i.ingress_bytes), 0) AS bytes,
    COALESCE(COUNT(*), 0) AS file_count
FROM ts_ingresses i
LEFT JOIN ts_annotations sa ON sa.entity_id = i.id 
    AND sa.key = '$source_annotation' 
    AND $__timeFilter(sa.entity_timestamp)
LEFT JOIN ts_annotations a ON a.entity_id = i.id 
    AND a.key = '$annotation_key' 
    AND $__timeFilter(a.entity_timestamp)
WHERE $__timeFilter(i.timestamp)
    AND i.data_source IN ($datasources)
    AND (
        '*' IN ($source_annotation_value)
        OR (sa.value IS NOT NULL AND sa.value IN ($source_annotation_value))
        OR ('Not Present' IN ($source_annotation_value) AND sa.value IS NULL)
    )
    AND (
        '*' IN ($annotation_value)
        OR (a.value IS NOT NULL AND a.value IN ($annotation_value))
        OR ('Not Present' IN ($annotation_value) AND a.value IS NULL)
    )
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY time, series_name;

SELECT
    time_bucket_gapfill(($__interval_ms || ' ms')::interval, e.timestamp) AS time,
    COALESCE(sa.value, 'Not Present') || ' (' || COALESCE(a.value, 'Not Present') || ')' AS series_name,
    COALESCE(SUM(e.egress_bytes), 0) AS bytes,
    COALESCE(COUNT(*), 0) AS file_count
FROM ts_egresses e
LEFT JOIN ts_annotations sa ON sa.entity_id = e.id 
    AND sa.key = '$source_annotation' 
    AND $__timeFilter(sa.entity_timestamp)
LEFT JOIN ts_annotations a ON a.entity_id = e.id 
    AND a.key = '$annotation_key' 
    AND $__timeFilter(a.entity_timestamp)
WHERE $__timeFilter(e.timestamp)
    AND e.data_source IN ($datasources)
    AND (
        '*' IN ($source_annotation_value)
        OR (sa.value IS NOT NULL AND sa.value IN ($source_annotation_value))
        OR ('Not Present' IN ($source_annotation_value) AND sa.value IS NULL)
    )
    AND (
        '*' IN ($annotation_value)
        OR (a.value IS NOT NULL AND a.value IN ($annotation_value))
        OR ('Not Present' IN ($annotation_value) AND a.value IS NULL)
    )
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY time, series_name;

SELECT 
   time_bucket_gapfill(($__interval_ms || ' ms')::interval, e.timestamp) AS time,
   COALESCE(sa.value, 'Not Present') || ' (' || COALESCE(a.value, 'Not Present') || ')' AS series_name,
   COALESCE(COUNT(*), 0) AS values
FROM ts_errors e
LEFT JOIN ts_annotations sa ON sa.entity_id = e.id 
   AND sa.key = '$source_annotation' 
   AND $__timeFilter(sa.entity_timestamp)
LEFT JOIN ts_annotations a ON a.entity_id = e.id 
   AND a.key = '$annotation_key' 
   AND $__timeFilter(a.entity_timestamp)
WHERE $__timeFilter(e.timestamp)
   AND e.data_source IN ($datasources)
   AND (
       '*' IN ($source_annotation_value)
       OR (sa.value IS NOT NULL AND sa.value IN ($source_annotation_value))
       OR ('Not Present' IN ($source_annotation_value) AND sa.value IS NULL)
   )
   AND (
       '*' IN ($annotation_value)
       OR (a.value IS NOT NULL AND a.value IN ($annotation_value))
       OR ('Not Present' IN ($annotation_value) AND a.value IS NULL)
   )
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY time, series_name;

SELECT 
   time_bucket_gapfill(($__interval_ms || ' ms')::interval, f.timestamp) AS time,
   COALESCE(sa.value, 'Not Present') || ' (' || COALESCE(a.value, 'Not Present') || ')' AS series_name,
   COALESCE(COUNT(*), 0) AS values
FROM ts_filters f
LEFT JOIN ts_annotations sa ON sa.entity_id = f.id 
   AND sa.key = '$source_annotation' 
   AND $__timeFilter(sa.entity_timestamp)
LEFT JOIN ts_annotations a ON a.entity_id = f.id 
   AND a.key = '$annotation_key' 
   AND $__timeFilter(a.entity_timestamp)
WHERE $__timeFilter(f.timestamp)
   AND f.data_source IN ($datasources)
   AND (
       '*' IN ($source_annotation_value)
       OR (sa.value IS NOT NULL AND sa.value IN ($source_annotation_value))
       OR ('Not Present' IN ($source_annotation_value) AND sa.value IS NULL)
   )
   AND (
       '*' IN ($annotation_value)
       OR (a.value IS NOT NULL AND a.value IN ($annotation_value))
       OR ('Not Present' IN ($annotation_value) AND a.value IS NULL)
   )
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY time, series_name;

SELECT
  COALESCE(sa.value, 'Not Present') AS source_annotation_value,
  COALESCE(a.value, 'Not Present') AS annotation_value,
  COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN table_name = 'ingress' THEN bytes END), 0) AS total_ingress_bytes,
  COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN table_name = 'ingress' THEN 1 END), 0) AS ingress_files,
  COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN table_name = 'egress' THEN bytes END), 0) AS total_egress_bytes,
  COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN table_name = 'egress' THEN 1 END), 0) AS egress_files,
  COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN table_name = 'error' THEN 1 END), 0) AS error_files,
  COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN table_name = 'filter' THEN 1 END), 0) AS filter_files
FROM (
  SELECT 'ingress' as table_name, data_source, id, ingress_bytes AS bytes 
  FROM ts_ingresses 
  WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    AND data_source IN ($datasources)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'egress' as table_name, data_source, id, egress_bytes AS bytes 
  FROM ts_egresses 
  WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    AND data_source IN ($datasources)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'error' as table_name, data_source, id, NULL AS bytes 
  FROM ts_errors 
  WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    AND data_source IN ($datasources)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'filter' as table_name, data_source, id, NULL AS bytes 
  FROM ts_filters 
  WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    AND data_source IN ($datasources)
) combined
LEFT JOIN ts_annotations sa ON sa.entity_id = combined.id 
    AND sa.key = '$source_annotation'
    AND $__timeFilter(sa.entity_timestamp)
LEFT JOIN ts_annotations a ON a.entity_id = combined.id 
    AND a.key = '$annotation_key'
    AND $__timeFilter(a.entity_timestamp)
WHERE (
    '*' IN ($source_annotation_value)
    OR (sa.value IS NOT NULL AND sa.value IN ($source_annotation_value))
    OR ('Not Present' IN ($source_annotation_value) AND sa.value IS NULL)
)
AND (
    '*' IN ($annotation_value)
    OR (a.value IS NOT NULL AND a.value IN ($annotation_value))
    OR ('Not Present' IN ($annotation_value) AND a.value IS NULL)
)
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY source_annotation_value, annotation_value;

list.definition:
SELECT key
FROM(
SELECT DISTINCT key
FROM ts_annotations
UNION ALL
SELECT 'No Annotations'
  WHERE NOT EXISTS (
SELECT 1
FROM ts_annotations 
LIMIT 1
)
) all_keys
ORDER BY key;
list.label: Source Annotation
list.name: source_annotation
list.query:
SELECT key
FROM(
SELECT DISTINCT key
FROM ts_annotations
UNION ALL
SELECT 'No Annotations'
  WHERE NOT EXISTS (
SELECT 1
FROM ts_annotations 
LIMIT 1
)
) all_keys
ORDER BY key;

list.definition:
SELECT value
FROM (
  SELECT DISTINCT value
  FROM ts_annotations
  WHERE $__timeFilter(entity_timestamp)
    AND data_source IN ($datasources)
    AND key = '$source_annotation'
  
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Not Present'
) all_values
ORDER BY 
  CASE WHEN value = 'Not Present' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END,
  value;
list.label: Source Annotation Value
list.name: source_annotation_value
list.query:
SELECT value
FROM (
  SELECT DISTINCT value
  FROM ts_annotations
  WHERE $__timeFilter(entity_timestamp)
    AND data_source IN ($datasources)
    AND key = '$source_annotation'
  
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Not Present'
) all_values
ORDER BY 
  CASE WHEN value = 'Not Present' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END,
  value;

list.definition:
SELECT key
FROM(
SELECT DISTINCT key
FROM ts_annotations
UNION ALL
SELECT 'No Annotations'
  WHERE NOT EXISTS (
SELECT 1
FROM ts_annotations 
LIMIT 1
)
) all_keys
ORDER BY key;
list.label: Grouped Annotation
list.name: annotation_key
list.query:
SELECT key
FROM(
SELECT DISTINCT key
FROM ts_annotations
UNION ALL
SELECT 'No Annotations'
  WHERE NOT EXISTS (
SELECT 1
FROM ts_annotations 
LIMIT 1
)
) all_keys
ORDER BY key;

list.definition:
SELECT value
FROM (
  SELECT DISTINCT value
  FROM ts_annotations
  WHERE $__timeFilter(entity_timestamp)
    AND data_source IN ($datasources)
    AND key = '$annotation_key'
  
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Not Present'
) all_values
ORDER BY 
  CASE WHEN value = 'Not Present' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END,
  value;
list.label: Grouped Annotation Value
list.name: annotation_value
list.query:
SELECT value
FROM (
  SELECT DISTINCT value
  FROM ts_annotations
  WHERE $__timeFilter(entity_timestamp)
    AND data_source IN ($datasources)
    AND key = '$annotation_key'
  
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Not Present'
) all_values
ORDER BY 
  CASE WHEN value = 'Not Present' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END,
  value;

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT data_source
FROM (
    SELECT DISTINCT data_source FROM ts_ingresses 
    WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    UNION
    SELECT DISTINCT data_source FROM ts_egresses 
    WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    UNION
    SELECT DISTINCT data_source FROM ts_errors 
    WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    UNION
    SELECT DISTINCT data_source FROM ts_filters 
    WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
) sources

ORDER BY data_source;
list.label: Data Sources
list.name: datasources
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT data_source
FROM (
    SELECT DISTINCT data_source FROM ts_ingresses 
    WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    UNION
    SELECT DISTINCT data_source FROM ts_egresses 
    WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    UNION
    SELECT DISTINCT data_source FROM ts_errors 
    WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    UNION
    SELECT DISTINCT data_source FROM ts_filters 
    WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
) sources

ORDER BY data_source;

title: Pivot by Annotation
